name: lineal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a person's lineage (= the members of a person's family who are directly related to that person and who lived a long time before him or her): She claims lineal descent from Henry VIII. A "relative" is the spouse, parent, brother or sister, or remoter lineal ancestor of the person. See
lineage
More examplesFewer examplesKing Carlos II died without a lineal heir. Native Hawaiians are defined as direct lineal descendants of indigenous peoples who lived on the islands before 1893.The lineal descendants of Hamilton and Burr plan to gather on the waterfront and reenact this most famous of American duels.
